subtasks: WritePageMainPage: Write the MainPage page itself

WritePageRequestPage: Write the RequestPage page itself
PlanPageAppPage: Decide on components, add sections to docs/tests.md
PlanComponentAppHeader: Add test entries for AppHeader (title, status badge, description, metadata)
PlanComponentAppActions: Add test entries for AppActions (Open Live App, Download Source Code buttons)
PlanComponentActivityLog: Add test entries for ActivityLog (live feed, refresh, historical view)
PlanComponentActivityLogEntry: Add test entries for ActivityLogEntry (timestamps, type tags, expandable sections)
PlanPageRequestPage: Decide on components, add sections to docs/tests.md
PlanComponentWizardStepper: Add test entries for WizardStepper (progress indicator: Describe App, Assessment, Confirmation)
PlanComponentDescribeAppForm: Add test entries for DescribeAppForm (app name, description, requirements fields)
PlanComponentAssessmentScreen: Add test entries for AssessmentScreen (loading state, policy check)
PlanComponentRejectionResult: Add test entries for RejectionResult (rejection reason, Edit Request button)
PlanComponentAcceptanceResult: Add test entries for AcceptanceResult (success message, Go to AppPage button, View all My Apps link)
